MAKECODE102EXT: Writing data for hacking stem experiments
MAKECODE102EXT.agentAnalyze: Check for any hazards in a direction
MAKECODE102EXT.agentAnalyze|param|dir: the direction to check for hazards
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDestroyL4: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDestroyL4|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDestroyL5: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDestroyL5|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDestroyL6: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDestroyL6|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDetectDryBrush: Detects if there is dry brush next to the agent in the specified direction
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDetectDryBrush|param: the direction to detect the dry brush
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDetectDryFern: Detects if there is a dry fern next to the agent in the specified direction
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDetectDryFern|param|: the direction to detect the dry fern
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDetectDryGrass: Detects if there is dry grass next to the agent in the specified direction
MAKECODE102EXT.agentDetectDryGrass|param: the direction to detect the dry grass
MAKECODE102EXT.agentLookForHazards: Agent watches the monitor for hazards
MAKECODE102EXT.agentSeeHazard: Sees that there is a hazard on the monitor
MAKECODE102EXT.alertTeam: Warns the team of a high-risk area
MAKECODE102EXT.hazardsRemainL4: Checks that there are fire hazards
MAKECODE102EXT.hazardsRemainL5: Checks that there are fire hazards
MAKECODE102EXT.hazardsRemainL6: Checks that there are fire hazards
